sub_title: Dyslexic Thinking | Innovation leader | Impact | Diversity of thought | Moonshot Thinking
summary:
I use my personal experience in creatively building businesses within large corporates to help them find new growth in building new impactful businesses.

My journey started with launching my first corporate startup, a location based mobile dating service.

For the past years I have focussed on helping corporates become successful in creating their own corporate startups at Aimforthemoon and have been a speaker, guest lecturer and moderator at: Emerce e-day, the Innov8rs conference, the Sustainable Brands conference, Amsterdam University of Applied Sciences, NIMA, Inholland University of Applied Sciences, Crea Geneve, IT innovation day and more.

Message or contact me if you are interested in:

Corporate startups / venture building, intrapreneurship and innovation Labs - I have had my boots on the ground and helped build successful and unsuccessful startups that all have learning that you can learn from. 

Creativity and innovative mindset - I help and coach teams to come up with creative business models based on my experience as an innovator, change maker and creative strategist (winning among other awards the AMMA award for the kick-off for the donor week)

Inspiration and public speaking - I have a lot of engaging war stories and anecdotes to share on innovation, creativity, corporate entrepreneurship which I can support with the right tools and methods.

Feel free to contact me via LinkedIn or mail me at leonard@aimforthemoon.com to see if I can help or connect you to the right people.

profile_positions.description:
We are a corporate innovation studio creating impact through business with teams of entrepreneurs and corporate innovators.

As partner I am responsible for building and growing our business with the top 500 corporates in the Netherlands. I function as a creative sparring partner to our customers and work with the team to improve and transform our offering.

We have grown a network of 500+ entrepreneurs, experts, creatives, visionaries, corporate heroes and we have worked with 200+ corporate partners. For every partnership we match the right team of entrepreneurial pioneers with the needed skills and mindset.

We take the lead in the moonshots that change the world. By mobilizing and uniting powerful organizations, entrepreneurs and capital around impact we start and scale new beginnings.
profile_positions.title: Partner: Inspiration & Impact

profile_positions.description: TechMeUp is a tech fund that invests in people's opportunities. We believe that training should be accessible to everyone, whatever your situation! That is why we, together with our partners, are committed to a more diverse and inclusive tech ecosystem every day.
profile_positions.title: Board Member

profile_positions.description: M. is not a museum, not yet. M. is the start of a new icon for Flevoland and Almere, which makes immersive art and landscape art accessible to everyone. Rooted in Flevoland, but with an international horizon. M. immerses you in images and experiences. Discover installations, events, performances and exhibitions. Wherever you want, wherever possible. Outside, inside and inside. Because M. stimulates your senses and plant a seed in your head.
profile_positions.title: Member Of The Supervisory Board

profile_positions.description: Aidsfonds is there for everyone who has to deal with HIV and AIDS. No matter who you love or what you do, how you live, what color your skin is, whether you are man or woman or child. Because everyone has the right to care. Unfortunately, the practice is different. Fighting AIDS requires courage and decisiveness. Dare to focus on the groups and areas where the problems are greatest. That is exactly what Aidsfonds does. We help those people who are most affected. In the Netherlands and abroad. To end AIDS, we work with local communities, invest in scientific research and ensure that AIDS remains high on the global agenda. Together we will stop AIDS. For the love of all loves.
profile_positions.title: Member of the Supervisory Board

profile_positions.description: Responsible for the Dutch and Finnish Lab of Sanoma. We transformed the Lab to focus primarily on building a venture building agency that would create stand alone corporate-startups, built new businesses for Sanoma brands and built new businesses together with other companies. We focussed on developing entrepreneurship and creativity by using lean-startup and design thinking methodologies.
profile_positions.title: Director of the Lab

profile_positions.description:
The Innovation Lab lead Sanoma's development of new creative pure-play digital corporate-startups and was responsible for leading the introduction of design thinking, lean-startup and entrepreneurial business development tools and methods across the whole of Sanoma through running accelerator programs some of which in cooperation with other Dutch corporations.

Our focus was to create an environment where the corporate-startups were able to prosper as seperate ventures by coaching the internal ventures on their business focus and linking them to the right stakeholders inside and outside the organizations to create an unfair competitive advantage and help accelerate the business of the corporate-startups.
profile_positions.title: Head of internal ventures Netherlands - Innovation Lab

profile_positions.description:
Responsible for transforming the business development team at Sanoma. 

My first focus was to transform the team from a department supporting the current business in mobile and social to the incubator of new game changing and innovative ideas for Sanoma's future. Based on validated learning we tried to find the best combination of strong consumer insights, new business models and technology in strategically important topics for Sanoma. The team was eventually integrated into the Sanoma Lab.
profile_positions.title: Manager Business Development ai.

profile_positions.description:
Manager of product management team responsible for the user generated content and social brands within Sanoma Digital women reaching over 5 mln unique visitors per month. We grew the business to become the most important digital part of the women's portfolio at Sanoma.

We succesfully launched two new business development initiatives in 2013 which generated significant traction within half a year of launching: Blogtoday.nl and Hettestpanel.nl. 

I was also responsible for the commercial strategy and sales development team of the complete Digital Women Brands portfolio. We focussed on developing strategic partnerships and improving the commercial products of the portfolio of all women's digital titles.
profile_positions.title: Business unit manager user generated content & social

profile_positions.description:
Responsible for developing the strategy & concept of cross-media partnerships and campaigns for advertisers at Sanoma. I was responsible for campaigns for customers like: Telfort, KPN, Procter & Gamble, Vodafone, Philips, Microsoft, Shell and BP. 

The crown of my work was that I was responsible for the highly decorated campaign "kick-off of the organ donor week" on our news site NU.nl. With 11.000 new registered organ donors within 24 hours (many more for the whole week) and massive media coverage the campaign surpassed all expectations. The the concept is stil the basis of the kick-off of the yearly donorweek in the Netherlands.
profile_positions.title: Strategy & Concept manager

profile_positions.description:
The marketing team of Digitenne was the got-to-market team of KPN’s terrestrial Digital television product. 

I was responsible for the planning, professionalization and accountability of our marketing efforts. Based on annual and quarterly plans we would execute the operational marketing planning in cooperation with distribution management and trade marketing. I also developed and executed the retention and customer lifecycle strategy for Digitenne.
profile_positions.title: Senior marketing manager Digitenne

profile_positions.description:
olllo was a mobile dating service to meet available singles near you. We started this corporate-startup when we won the New Venture accelerator for KPN's high potentials. Even though our project was cancelled after a year we did have some great achievements:
- We built a business, platform and brand from scratch within 6 months.
- We launched the first pure play mobile and  location based dating service in Europe
- We managed to acquire 10.000 users in the first month
- We got covered in all major media channels
profile_positions.title: Co-Founder olllo - Location based dating service

profile_positions.description:
Primarily responsible for the sales of the voice-and data portfolio tot Vodafone operator companies in different country's.
	
Based on the account plan developed together with product management, network management and quality management we implemented a new integral service approach. This resulted in KPN being selected as one of four global preferred Vodafone suppliers for their international voice services which immediately resulted in a significant growth in revenue.
profile_positions.title: Key Account Manager Mobile Operators

profile_positions.description:
Sales and purchase for all customers in the Benelux, Germany and Austria. 

Account portfolio of 45 named accounts including two top 5 customers for which I was responsible for large bilateral sales and purchase deals. In addition to the commercial activities I was also responsible for the quality of the service, contract negotiation and the infrastructure that we had with our customers.
profile_positions.title: Account Manager International Wholesale

profile_positions.description: Responsible for the sales for high end consultancy in the enterprise application development market.
profile_positions.title: Account Manager

volunteer_experiences.role: Helping to set up a child help line
